events.name: device_connected
events.description: Event triggered when a device is connected to the bluetooth module

data.name: device
data.description: The device that was connected

data.name: mac
data.description: The address of the device that was connected

data.name: rssi
data.description: The signal strength of the connected device

data.name: paired
data.description: Whether the device is paired or not

events.name: device_disconnected
events.description: Event triggered when a device is disconnected from the bluetooth module

data.name: device
data.description: The device that was disconnected

data.name: mac
data.description: The address of the device that was disconnected

events.name: device_paired
events.description: Event triggered when a device is successfully paired

data.name: device
data.description: The device that was paired

data.name: mac
data.description: The address of the device that was paired

events.name: device_unpaired
events.description: Event triggered when a device is unpaired

data.name: device
data.description: The device that was unpaired

data.name: mac
data.description: The address of the device that was unpaired

events.name: device_discovered
events.description: Event triggered when a device is discovered during a scan

data.name: device
data.description: The device that was discovered

data.name: mac
data.description: The address of the device that was discovered

data.name: rssi
data.description: The signal strength of the discovered device

events.name: connection_error
events.description: Event triggered when there is an error in the Bluetooth connection

data.name: error
data.description: The error message

events.name: pairing_request
events.description: Event triggered when a pairing request is received from a Bluetooth device

data.name: device
data.description: The device requesting pairing

data.name: mac
data.description: The address of the device requesting pairing

data.name: passkey
data.description: The passkey for pairing
The pin for pairing

events.name: pairing_success
events.description: Event triggered when a pairing process completes successfully

data.name: device
data.description: The device that was paired

data.name: mac
data.description: The address of the device that was paired

events.name: pairing_failure
events.description: Event triggered when a pairing process fails

data.name: device
data.description: The device that failed to pair

data.name: mac
data.description: The address of the device that failed to pair

data.name: error
data.description: The error message

events.name: bluetooth_enabled
events.description: Event triggered when Bluetooth is enabled on the device

events.name: bluetooth_disabled
events.description: Event triggered when Bluetooth is disabled on the device

events.name: scan_started
events.description: Event triggered when a Bluetooth scan starts

events.name: scan_stopped
events.description: Event triggered when a Bluetooth scan stops

events.name: bonding_started
events.description: Event triggered when the bonding process starts with a Bluetooth device

data.name: device
data.description: The device with which bonding started

data.name: mac
data.description: The address of the device with which bonding started

events.name: bonding_completed
events.description: Event triggered when the bonding process completes with a Bluetooth device

data.name: device
data.description: The device with which bonding completed

data.name: mac
data.description: The address of the device with which bonding completed

events.name: bonding_failed
events.description: Event triggered when the bonding process fails with a Bluetooth device

data.name: device
data.description: The device with which bonding failed

data.name: mac
data.description: The address of the device with which bonding failed

data.name: error
data.description: The error message
